text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

Among the most
memorable and enjoyable

experiences during my
long journey at HBS

has been working with
colleagues to help

them embrace and feel confident
with this wonderful case method
pedagogy.

Power and distinctiveness
of the case method

flow from its being part
science, part art, part craft.

As science, it is the systematic
observation and analysis

of the functioning of
enterprises and managers.

As art is the creation of a
case study and envisioning

how it could catalyze
enriching class discussion.

The craft is embedded in
the discussion leadership

skills, which are essential
for powerful learning.

The case method can be scary
to teachers and students.

Teachers have to cede their
absolute control of the lecture

method to the uncertainties
of discussion dynamics.

And students can no longer
be silent attendees,

they must expose their
thoughts to peers and teachers.

Intimidating, but also
invigorating and fun.

That distinctive
pedagogy triggers

higher levels of
intellectual, cognitive,

and emotional engagement that
produce deeper imprinting
and more durable learning.

That power is rooted in
student-centered active
learning.

The case method is
highly productive

because it yields a
double learning dividend.

First one is learning
frameworks, concepts,

techniques applied to
real-world problems.

The discussion process itself
builds key discussion skills.
Identifying alternatives.
Listening carefully to others.
Assessing alternatives.
Formulating action plans.
Testing values.

Persuading peers and
making decisions.
The process is the product.

The beauty and the
fragility of the method

stem from being built around
a contract of collaboration.

For there to be a robust
learning dividend,

both students and faculty
must invest heavily

in individual study and then
collaborative preparation

in their study groups, in
their faculty teaching groups.

There is a myth that a great
case will teach itself.

There is no doubt that
you need an excellent case

to build a strong
discussion launch pad.

But the trajectory and how high
the learning rocket will go

depends on skilled
instructor guidance.

And there may be
no take-off at all

if you don't have the fuel of
the preparation by the student.

Few reflections of a
fellow case traveler.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
